DESCRIPTION.FIRST: MyInstruments brings the new era of online shopping. Choosing a new instrument has never been easier before.
DESCRIPTION.SECOND: Find the instrument that fits you best. Using MyInstruments' detailed filters and categories, you can easily find the product you are looking for.
DESCRIPTION.THIRD: Connect now to a community of musicians. Sign Up or if you already have an account, Log in.

INSTRUMENT_CARD.GUITAR_TEXT: Choose the best guitar from the app!
INSTRUMENT_CARD.DRUM_TEXT: Choose the best drum kit from the app!
INSTRUMENT_CARD.BASS_TEXT: Choose the best bass from the app!
INSTRUMENT_CARD.VIOLIN_TEXT: Choose the best violin from the app!
INSTRUMENT_CARD.PIANO_TEXT: Choose the best piano from the app!

ACCOUNT_CREATION_LABEL.SUCCESSFUL: User successfully created! Please return to login page and log in to your account.
ACCOUNT_CREATION_LABEL.FAILED: An error occurred, please try again later!

ERROR.BASIC_MESSAGE: An error occurred, please try again later!

PASSWORD.LENGTH_MESSAGE: Password too short or too long.
PASSWORD.VALID_MESSAGE: The password must contain upper and lowercase letters, as well as a number.
